trans-unit.source: An <codeEntityReference>T:Windows.Foundation.IAsyncAction</codeEntityReference> that represents an asynchronous action.
trans-unit.target: An <codeEntityReference>T:Windows.Foundation.IAsyncAction</codeEntityReference> that represents an asynchronous action.

trans-unit.source: Creates the container and specifies the level of access to the container's data.
trans-unit.target: Creates the container and specifies the level of access to the container's data.

trans-unit.source: An <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Blob.BlobContainerPublicAccessType</codeEntityReference> object that specifies whether data in the container may be accessed publicly and what level of access is to be allowed.
trans-unit.target: An <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Blob.BlobContainerPublicAccessType</codeEntityReference> object that specifies whether data in the container may be accessed publicly and what level of access is to be allowed.

trans-unit.source: A <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Blob.BlobRequestOptions</codeEntityReference> object that specifies additional options for the request.
trans-unit.target: A <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Blob.BlobRequestOptions</codeEntityReference> object that specifies additional options for the request.

trans-unit.source: An <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.OperationContext</codeEntityReference> object that represents the context for the current operation.
trans-unit.target: An <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.OperationContext</codeEntityReference> object that represents the context for the current operation.

trans-unit.source: An <codeEntityReference>T:Windows.Foundation.IAsyncAction</codeEntityReference> that represents an asynchronous action.
trans-unit.target: An <codeEntityReference>T:Windows.Foundation.IAsyncAction</codeEntityReference> that represents an asynchronous action.
